karanna), tharamak asamanya thathwayak, aya mage rogiyek wuna wagema mage sama wayas nisa mage mithuriyak bawata path una, muslim wuwada aya sinhala pirimiyek samaga katha karanna chakithayak dakwuye naha, ee rogaya haduna ganna rudhira parikshana kihipayak, wakugaduwe bayopsi ekak wage parikshana kihipayak karagathayuthuwa thibuna, kalaya kemen kemen sathiyak pamana gatha wuna, parikshana ekin eka karagena yaddi age rogaya gana yamakisi awabodhayak ganna puluwan unath, rogaya nishchithawama haduna ganna haki une naha.

eya aposa samanya pela awasan kara hithe kisima barak nomathiwa itha sathutin rasthiyadu wu kalayayi.ude rasthiyaduwata watena apa kandayamata aapasu gedara ennata welawak kalawak nowiya.boho wita pasuda maha pandara gedara dorata thattu kalawita dora noarena dawasda paminiya wita ra wuna thanaka nidagannata purudu wuyemu.kalaya wegayen gala giyeya.me kiyana kalaye ape gedara nawathi siti amuththiyakda wiya.aya ape loku amma hewath mawage wadumal sahodariyage deweni diyaniya hewath chuti akka yayi apa wisin amathana lada sohoyuriya wuwaya.moratuwe welona aayathanaye ketikalina puhunuwakata theri siti ayata puhunuwa awasanaye kuda karmantha departhamenthuwe rakiyawak labennata niyamithawa thibini.siya upan gama hewath mage mawage sundara gam piyasa wu bothale sita dinapatha ude pandara moratuwata yannata pahasukam manda wuyen aya apa niwase nawathi sita ude hawasa dumriye moratuwata gaman gaththaya.kemen kemen ayage puhunu kalaya awasanwa aapasu bothaleta yannata laka lasthi wana witath ape rasthiyaduwa saruwata keremin thibuni.dinak hawasa supurudu rasthiyaduwa sandaha ma niwasin eliyata basina wita midule siti chuti akka mata kathakalaya.

pasal sisun ekolos lakshayak sandaha 2011 warshaye di aahara labadimata rajaya rupiyal miliyana 2800 k waya karana bawa adhyapana amathyanshaya pawasayi.widuhal 7600 ka sisu daruwan wenuwen me wasare di aahara labadena jathika wadasatahana adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana mahatha ge pradhanathwayen mimure kayikawala kanitu widuhale di heta (14) perawaruwe pawathwe.pasal daruwan ge poshanaya nanwalime aramunin mahinda chinthana jathika punarjiwana wadapiliwela yatathe adhyapana amathyanshaya mema poshana wadasatahana kriyathmaka karayi. 2010 wasare di poshana wada satahanata rupiyal miliyana 2300 k waya kala bawath me wasare di eya thawath miliyana 500 kin wadi kala bawath adhyapana amathyanshaya kiyayi.siyayakata aduwen sitina pasalwala sisun siyalu denata ma aahara wadasatahana kriyathmaka karena athara sesu pasalwala palamu wani shreniye sita paswani shreniya dakwa sisu daruwan sandaha meya kriyathmaka wana bawa da amathyanshaye jyeshta niladhariniyak pawasuwaya..
